item.title: How to Sign Up and Get Started using Google Adwords Keyword Planner
item.description: Note: This is just a “stub”, and doesn’t go fully into the details of keyword research. I have written an article on the subject, and begun some study of Keyword Research and SEO, although I’m not by any means an expert. I made this, because it was a little confusing for me when I first tried to use it, and I wanted to be sure that eveyone in my organization had a fundamental understanding of keyword research, so they could assist in coming up with seed-keywords, and understand the building blocks of keyword-research.
